Reference version 0.1.0

All functions

auth_UMLS

Authenticate against UMLS.

filter_source_level

Filter results to include source vocabularies with a particular restriction level.

get_all_children

Get all of the children of a given source item.

get_all_parents

Get all of the parents of a given source item.

get_all_subset_info

Get information on all UMLS subsets.

get_atom_family get_atom_parents get_atom_children get_atom_ancestors get_atom_descendants

Get familial relationships for a given Atom.

get_atom_info

Get information about a given atom.

get_concept_atoms get_concept_atoms_page

Get UMLS concept atoms.

get_concept_info

Get UMLS concept info.

get_concept_rels

Get the Metathesaurus Concept-Concept relationships for a given CUI.

get_internal_codes

Get the internal codes for atoms from a list of vocabularies.

get_mem_info

Get information on a member of a given subset.

get_pref_atom

Get the preferred atom for a concept.

get_service_ticket set_service_ticket

Get a service ticket.

get_source_atoms

Get UMLS source info for a concept.

get_source_attrs

Get source-asserted attributes.

get_source_family get_source_parents get_source_children get_source_ancestors get_source_descendants

Get source familial relationships.

get_source_info

Get UMLS source info for a concept.

get_source_rels

Get relations for source object.

get_subset_attr

Get the attributes of a UMLS subset.

get_all_subset_info_page get_subset_info

Get the info on a UMLS subset.

get_subset_mems get_subset_mems_page

Get members of a given subset.

get_TGT set_TGT reset_TGT

Get a TGT token from the UMLS API.

rUMLS

An R Interface To The NLM Unified Medical Language System

search_UMLS

Search the UMLS.

source_level

Obtain source vocabularies with a given licensing restriction level.

UMLS_creds

Get or set UMLS credentials.
